pages.text: The $(item)Machine Infuser$() uses $(l:rftoolsbase:basics/dimensional_shards)Dimensional Shards$() to $(thing)improve the efficiency$() of a lot of machines. For most things, infusing them will reduce their power requirements. Some devices will have additional benefits from infusion. $(br2)$(thing)Infusing$() the Infuser will cause it to use less power.
See overleaf for additional uses for the Machine Infuser, depending on what other mods you have installed.
